column2: The China Red LED light system project of the core tubes in Beijing Bird`s Nest
column4: National indoor stadium which is also known as Bird`s Nest is located in the Beijing Olympic park with a architecture area of 260 thousand square meters, the LED lamp outside the gymnasium deduces China red and lightens the nest dramatically, presents a fantastic steel structure shadow for the views, the light changes along with heart beat and breath. Those running fluctuation endows the Nest with meaning of life.
